summary: Comprehensive testing of StickerSwap MVP completed. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend authentication and core features working. Language switcher, responsive design, and form validation tested successfully.

ui_bugs.issue: Session appears to expire or navigation fails when moving between group pages
ui_bugs.details: After successful group creation, navigation to inventory page times out, suggesting possible session management or routing issue

design_issues.issue: App uses vibrant football theme with appropriate Spanish/English i18n

passed_tests: Backend API connectivity and all endpoints (100% success rate)
OTP authentication flow (email send, OTP verification, JWT tokens)
Album and sticker data loading (100 FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 stickers)
Matches, offers, chat, and notifications endpoints
Frontend login flow (email input, OTP form, error handling)
Form validation (empty email, invalid email format)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor session management issue: investigate why navigation from group home to inventory page fails after successful authentication. All core functionality working correctly.
